nodes.text: The Spyder was a sabacc parlor on Coruscant. It was run by the reserved Bothan Korsin Fenn. It was frequented by Black Sun operatives. At some point, the criminal Kaa'to Leeachos owed The Spyder 20,000 credits and ended up banned from the place. The Spyder was important in a group of Pyke Syndicate operatives' mission to hunt down Leeachos, as they were able to pry information on him from Fenn and made contact wit some Black Sun members, from whom they managed to win information in a sabacc game.

The Spyder was introduced in the Under a Black Sun-scenario. Gaining information on Leeachos from Fenn and winning information in a game of sabacc are presented as some of the options that the player characters can make use of in progressing through the scenario.
